refnamediv.refpurpose: Applies registry patches to registry files

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: The regpatch utility applies registry patches to Windows registry files. The patch files should have the same format as is being used by the regdiff utility and regedit32.exe from Windows.
If no patch file is specified on the command line, regpatch attempts to read it from standard input.

listitem.para: Name of backend to load. Possible values are: creg, regf, dir and rpc. The default is dir.
Credentials to use, if any. Password should be separated from user name by a percent sign.

refsect1.title: VERSION
refsect1.para: This man page is correct for version 4.0 of the Samba suite.

refsect1.title: SEE ALSO
refsect1.para: regdiff, regtree, regshell, gregedit, samba, diff, patch

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: This utility is part of the Samba suite, which is developed by the global Samba Team.
This manpage and regpatch were written by Jelmer Vernooij.
